engine.input.opengl

Class OpenGLInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.input.opengl.OpenGLInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInput

    public class OpenGLInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInput
    An implementation of IInput compatible with OpenGLDisplay.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)
